hero.subtitle: Luxury perfumes with lasting presence
hero.aboutTagline: Sahir – Where every fragrance tells a story
hero.aboutText1: At Sahir, we offer a curated collection of luxury perfumes with high concentration and long-lasting presence. We design fragrances that blend Arabic authenticity with global elegance to suit modern taste.
hero.aboutText2: Each Sahir fragrance is carefully blended to give you a powerful presence that lasts all day. Choose your favorite fragrance from our diverse collection that suits every occasion.

features.title: Why Choose Sahir?
features.intro: We offer you a luxurious fragrance experience that combines high quality, long-lasting presence, and elegant packaging. Choose from our collection what suits your personality, and enjoy an unforgettable fragrance.
